ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Demonstrates how to use MVVM to databind SciChart to a DataSeriesSet. This example uses a single line chart, with View and ViewModel and shows how to bind SciChart to a data-source and append new data using the MVVM pattern.
ExampleDefinition.Description:
Demonstrates how to use MVVM to databind a SciChart RenderableSeries declared in XAML to a DataSeries declared in a ViewModel.
This example uses a single line chart, with View and ViewModel and shows how to bind SciChart to a data-source and append new data using the MVVM pattern.
[i][b]Note:[/b][/i] Also see the documentation and examples featuring the [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/webframe.html#MVVM%20DataSeries%20RenderableSeries%20API.html']SeriesBinding Markup Extension[/url], as this shows how to declare RenderableSeries and DataSeries from your ViewModel, for a true MVVM application.
